org.svvrl.goal.core

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collects several error messages.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      A message for the case where the operation only accepts QPTL formulae.

      A message for the case where a proposition already exists in some automaton.

      A message for the case where the state size of the source automaton to be complemented by the Ramsey-based construction is too large.

      A message for receiving an automaton that is not deterministic.

      • quantificationNotSupported

        public static java.lang.String quantificationNotSupported(java.lang.String alg)
        Invoked to generate a string saying that formulae with quantification are not supported by the given algorithm alg.
        Parameters:
        alg - the name of the algorithm
        Returns:
        a string saying that formulae with quantification are not supported by alg

        Returns:

      • onlyForAutomata

        public static java.lang.String onlyForAutomata(AutomatonType... types)
        Invoked to generate a string saying that an operation only supports automata of specified types.
        Parameters:
        types - the automaton types supported
        Returns:
        a string saying that an operation only supports automata of the specified types

      • onlyForAutomata

        public static java.lang.String onlyForAutomata(java.lang.Class<?>... accs)

        accs - the given acceptance conditions supported
        Returns:
